comment:
* Base diff class that contains info about whether something was added, and a set of named
     * fields that changed.
     * Extend for diffs of specific types of objects.

variables.name: mExists
variables.comment: Whether the diff was added or removed

variables.name: mFields
variables.comment: Map from field name to diffs for any standalone fields in the object.

methods.name: public abstract boolean hasDiff()
methods.comment: * Return whether this diff represents any changes.

methods.name: public abstract String toString()
methods.comment: * Return a string representation of the diff.

methods.name: final void addField(String name, FieldDiff diff)
methods.comment:
* Add a diff for a specific field to the map.
         * @param name field name
         * @param diff FieldDiff object representing the diff

methods.name: public final boolean wasAdded()
methods.comment: * Returns whether this diff represents a config being newly added.

methods.name: public final boolean wasRemoved()
methods.comment: * Returns whether this diff represents a config being removed.

methods.name: public final boolean hasExistenceChange()
methods.comment: * Returns whether this diff represents an object being either added or removed.

methods.name: public final boolean hasFieldDiffs()
methods.comment: * Returns whether there are any individual field diffs.

methods.name: public final FieldDiff getDiffForField(String name)
methods.comment: * Returns the diff for the specific named field if it exists

methods.name: public final Set<String> fieldNamesWithDiff()
methods.comment: * Get the set of all field names with some diff.

methodNames: final void addField(String name, FieldDiff diff)
